talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Norfe$
Just trust me. And... please deliver this letter to Vernicka for me when you arrive.
(Norfe hands over an envelope.)

$Norfe$
I know you might be a little upset.
But nothing bad will happen.

$April$
Hello! Oh? You look a little down.
I like sweet things when I'm depressed.

${user_nick}$
Uh… Well… Actually… I was just wondering what the mood is like over there.
(Yeah, I should get a sense from April of what things are like at the Headquarters right now.)

$April$
Over there? Oh… at the Headquarters?
Why do you ask? Is there something in particular you're wondering about?

${user_nick}$
I… have a request for the President, but…
I think it would be best to go when he's in a good mood.

$April$
Oh, I see! In that case, don't you worry! Now is a good time to go.

${user_nick}$
Right now? Uh… You sure?

$April$
Yeah, the mood is always foul at the Headquarters these days, so there's no point in waiting for it to improve.
Might as well get it out of the way, right? You always get out of there in one piece anyway, {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
Uh, wait, did you say the mood was foul? Really?
(Ugh, I knew the issue with Shalica would be an obstacle. What do I do now?)

$April$
Yep. I heard there was a big kerfuffle.
A guest arrived and then... the President was screaming.
They were yelling so loudly we could hear it out on the streets. Something about someone being a crazy fool.

$April$
Surprisingly, the guest walked out unharmed, and since then,
the atmosphere at the Headquarters has been awful.
All the servants of the head office ordered digestive pills because they were so stressed.

${user_nick}$
Digestive pills? Digestive pills…
Haha… Ha… Yeah, I really think I should just come back la-...

$Guard$
Let's see... Oh, there they are.
You! Yes, you two.

${user_nick}$
(Aaaack!)

$Guard$
You two have been summoned to the Headquarters by the President.
Now, let's go!

$Grele$
What? Can we just go like this? Or…

${user_nick}$
Uh, never mind Grele! We have to go at some point anyway.
Digestive pills… Digestive pills…

$April$
See you two later!

$President Vernicka$
……

${user_nick}$
Uh… Hello…
(His eyes look so cold. Now I get why he is called the Blue Viper).

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_01.ogg}
Just forget it. I have nothing to discuss with you.
You're not worth talking to at the moment.

${user_nick}$
… Huh?

$Grele$
What? How dare you be so rude to {user_nick}!
It wasn't {user_nick}'s fault. I won't just stand here and watch you torment {user_nick}!

${user_nick}$
Grele?!

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_02.ogg}
(Vernicka stares at Grele, eyes blazing.)
There, that's better. Grele, is it? If you have something more to say, now is the time.

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9946_sp_01.ogg}
All right then, I will! I have a lot to say!
Lica ended up like that because of the Goddess. It wasn't {user_nick}'s fault!

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9946_sp_02.ogg}
If I had been stronger...! If I could have been stronger… my sister and Lica…
If I had just stayed by their side, they wouldn't have ended up like that!

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_03.ogg}
What would staying together have done? She became a Child because of the Goddess.
The only thing that happens when Childs come together is slaughter. Oh, do you mean you would have gobbled her up?

$Grele$
No! I could have protected her! From the Goddess! From this world! If I was strong enough!

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_04.ogg}
What's certain is you are a good talker, boy. Is this the hope of the Anti-Goddess Faction?
A boy who whines about how he couldn't protect anything, how he couldn't save anyone?

${user_nick}$
Why are you being like this?! Grele did nothing wrong!

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_05.ogg}
What did he do wrong? If you want to get into it, everything he said was fundamentally wrong.
A Child preventing the will of the Goddess? Can a fruit reject its roots?

$Grele$
A-, are you going to keep cutting me off?
If you do I'll be angry! No… No! I have... to stop this.

${user_nick}$
(This is bad. He is about to explode.)
Grele! Calm down. Don't allow yourself to be overcome with anger. Grele!

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_06.ogg}
That's it. The seed of resentment germinates the moment the Goddess wants it. That's the source of your hatred and anger.
You think someone like you can stop it?

$Grele$
I… will… kill… you...!
No… This is not… the-…

$President Vernicka$
You're just the Goddess' puppet; her slave.
Even now all you can think about is killing me, right?

${user_nick}$
Stop it! Grele, Grele! Wake up!

$Grele$
Cough… Ugh… No… That's not…
... That's not what I'm saying. If I had more time; another chance…

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_07.ogg}
(Vernicka's eyes soften as he sees Grele calm down. In fact, he looks intrigued.)
Oh-ho. Good, you have bridled your rage.

$Grele$
Maybe… if my sister had become like me...
Yes, we would have at least been able to protect Lica.

${user_nick}$
Grele…

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9946_sp_03.ogg}
You… seriously… dodged a bullet!
I almost killed you.

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_08.ogg}
You think? I'm not sure I would've gone so quietly.
Anyway, it is now time to put our full support behind Rhadames.

${user_nick}$
Huh?

$Grele$
... What?

$President Vernicka$
(Vernicka sighs.)
Norfe knows how things are done in the business world, so he wouldn't have just sent you two. Where is the letter?

${user_nick}$
Here. He told us to deliver this letter.

$President Vernicka$
(Vernicka squints in your direction.)
I figured as much. Give it here.

$President Vernicka$
(Vernicka receives the letter, opens the envelope and scans through the contents in a flash.)
Well, it's exactly what I expected. I will fully accept the proposal.

$President Vernicka$
Rhadames is in a crisis, so we will support you with emergency funds and
provide all kinds of necessary supplies including foodstuffs and equipment.

${user_nick}$
(What led him to agree easily? Especially with what happened to Shalica…)

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_09.ogg}
You seem surprised that we've wrapped up negotiations so easily. Are you nervous there might be some kind of hidden agenda?
Seriously… I'm amazed at how little business sense you have.

$President Vernicka$
And come to think of it, you must not have a clue why Norfe would send you and Grele here.

${user_nick}$
... Right…

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_10.ogg}
It's true that I'm still furious, even at this very moment. How could I not be angry that Shalica
ended up that way?

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_11.ogg}
But I'm not in the position to simply let anger dictate my actions.
Think about it. What hope do I have left to cling to?

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_12.ogg}
It's all in the hands of the Mutant Child. And now that Aergal has fallen,
how could a I turn a blind eye to Rhadames, the only place left with the technical ability to research the Mutant Child?

$President Vernicka$
I suppose that's why Norfe sent you two to me.
To give me a preview of the product I am purchasing with my investment. If a Child can turn out like you, I should trust that it can happen again.
It's so obvious that it's annoying.

${user_nick}$
I see. So...

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_13.ogg}
Oh my... Your softening expression tells me you still let your guard down too easily.
If you want to remain in my good books after receiving this support, you will have to save Shalica. Understood?

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9946_sp_04.ogg}
Yes! We will save Lica. We have to.

${user_nick}$
Grele…

$Grele$
Now that we've found the Cup of Healing lid, we just need to figure out how it's used.
Once we do that, we can bring back my sister and Lica.

${user_nick}$
(I wish we could do that, but is it really possible?)

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9946_sp_05.ogg}
That's right! And when we do, I'll be expecting an apology from you.
You should apologize for how rudely you spoke to me and {user_nick}!

${user_nick}$
What?!

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_14.ogg}
If you can do that I'll throw rose petals at your feet.
I, Vernicka, will humbly apologize for my behavior.

$Grele$
I'll remember that promise! I look forward to it!

$President Vernicka${sound:npc_Vernicka_qu9946_sp_15.ogg}
A Lagendian adventurer and a Mutant Child.
… You are a mysterious pair, you two.

$President Vernicka$
I suspected something was different, but you really have changed.
The Hope of the Anti-Goddess Faction…

$President Vernicka$
(Vernicka's eyes shine as he looks at Grele.)
Someone I thought should be eliminated has now become key. What a surprising turn of events.

$Grele$
What the heck does that mean?
{user_nick}, are we done here?

$President Vernicka$
No, I need you to run an errand for me first.
I trust you will agree since it is for Rhadames.

${user_nick}$
An errand? Uh… It's not going to put us in a difficult position is it?

$President Vernicka$
Don't act like you'll refuse if it does. It's not as if you have a choice.

${user_nick}$
Tsk, but still! (I hate not being able to refuse!)

$President Vernicka$
Pfft… Anyway, don't worry. It's no big deal.
Now, bring this document to Honest Merchant Pero for me. We just drew it up.
And deliver this sealed letter to Merchant Gilbert in Merca's Port.

${user_nick}$
We just have to deliver them?

$President Vernicka$
If you gave me the time I could come up with twenty more things for you to do.
So you better go before I do. There's so much work to be done here.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
Welcome, {user_nick}. We've been seeing each other a lot lately.
I've already sent the remaining supplies to Rhadames. Is there something else you need?

${user_nick}$
No, I'm just here to deliver a message from Vernicka.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
A message from Vernicka… I see.
(Pero examines the document.)

$Honest Merchant Pero$
No way!

${user_nick}$
W-, what is it? Is it something bad?

$Honest Merchant Pero$
This is... an unexpected amount. And quantity of goods...
And this isn't even the full amount, just a pre-payment. What is happening?

${user_nick}$
Um… Merca has pledged full support for Rhadames, so…

$Honest Merchant Pero$
I'm not sure what caused such a change of heart for Vernicka, but…
There won't be any issue with funding. I just need to make sure I use it wisely, is all...

$Honest Merchant Pero$
Thank you for the good news.
I wish you well on your journey.

$Merchant Gilbert$
Welcome!
(Gilbert flashes a businessman's smile at first, looking you up and down. Then his face hardens.)
Wait… Aren't you the adventurer who was always talking about flawless jewels? What brings you here this time?

${user_nick}$
(Is he really the target of the message?)
Here… Vernicka told me to deliver this to you.

$Merchant Gilbert$
Vernicka? The President of Merca?
What are you talking about? Why would the President use an adventurer to run errands?

$Grele$
What's it to you? Why do you care whether Vernicka is asking us to do his bidding?

$Merchant Gilbert$
Wait... Those gold eyes! Oh my, I didn't realize I was speaking with a Child! My apologies!
The President must have had good reason to ask you to do so!

$Grele$
There is no need to apologize to me. But you do owe {user_nick} an apology.

$Merchant Gilbert$
My apologies, adventurer! I had no idea you were traveling with a Child!
You must be closely associated with the President!

${user_nick}$
… Forget it. Just take this.

$Merchant Gilbert$
Yes! Understood!
(Quickly receives the envelope and reads the letter inside, then his face darkens.)

$Merchant Gilbert$
Requisitioning… Ice Flowers… Procure… three in advance?!
How am I supposed to get that many of something so rare?!

${user_nick}$
Ice Flowers? He said something about Ice Flowers in the message?

$Merchant Gilbert$
He told me to get three flowers! Doesn't he know how rare they are?!
He said he'd pay a good price for them, but... it's not like he's the kind of guy to give above market value.

$Grele$
Ice Flowers, huh? Can we take one?

$Merchant Gilbert$
No way! I was promised I would get paid... You have to pay for it, even if you're a Child!

${user_nick}$
… Well, there must be a reason why Vernicka is doing all this.
We can always come back later, so let's go Grele.

$Grele$
Okay, let's go.

$Merchant Gilbert$
Oh my. Thank you. Farewell!
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: To the Headquarters
journal.contents:
You finally left for Merca. All you have to offer is Norfe's letter to Vernicka and you still don't know how to tell him about what happened to Shalica. Maybe you should consult with someone before entering the Headquarters?

Merca's Heart - Merchant April

journal.title: Into the Viper's Den
journal.contents:
According to April, the mood in the Headquarters is atrociously bad. How can you speak with Vernicka under these circumstances? You don't have a clue what to say to him.

Merca's Heart - President Vernicka
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to President Vernicka at Merca’s Headquarters
journal.todo_msg: Speak with President Vernicka at Merca’s Headquarters.

journal.title: At a Loss for Words
journal.contents:
It is hard to even complete a sentence before the infinitely cold President Vernicka. In spite of the tension, Grele begins to talk back to him!

Merca's Heart - Grele
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Grele at Merca’s Headquarters
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Grele at Merca's Headquarters.

journal.title: Sudden Acceptance
journal.contents:
Grele almost exploded, but somehow endured his extreme anger. Then Vernicka suddenly promised to fully support Rhadames. What's going on? You should listen to what Vernicka has to say next.

Merca's Heart - President Vernicka
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to President Vernicka at Merca’s Headquarters
journal.todo_msg: Speak with President Vernicka at Merca’s Headquarters.

journal.title: Yet Another Deal
journal.contents:
Vernicka has something to say to Grele. He says that his last remaining hope is that Shalica becomes a Mutant Child like Grele. It seems Norfe sent Grele {user_nick} to show him that fact. Vernicka readily agrees to provide support, proving that Norfe was right. However, Grele still looks upset. You should speak with Grele.

Merca's Heart - Grele
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Grele at Merca’s Headquarters
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Grele at Merca's Headquarters.

journal.title: Yet Another Errand
journal.contents:
Grele tells Vernicka that he better apologize if you manage to save Lica. Vernicka says he would be happy to. But it seems Vernicka has something to ask of you before you leave. Speak with him.

Merca's Heart - President Vernicka
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to President Vernicka at Merca’s Headquarters
journal.todo_msg: Speak with President Vernicka at Merca’s Headquarters.

journal.title: Major Player Makes a Move
journal.contents:
Vernicka lives up to his name as the Blue Viper. It turns out he already had the documents drawn up for arranging material support. First, take the documents to Honest Merchant Pero.

Merca's Heart - Honest Merchant Pero
journal.destination: (Solo) Deliver Documents to Honest Merchant Pero of Merca
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the documents to Honest Merchant Pero of Merca.

journal.title: Deliver Sealed Letter
journal.contents:
You delivered the documents to Honest Merchant Pero. It seems the amount of money Merca has set aside to support Rhadames is quite significant. Now deliver to Merchant Gilbert the Sealed Letter Vernicka gave you.

Merca's Port - Merchant Gilbert
journal.destination: (Solo) Deliver Sealed Letter to Merchant Gilbert in Merca's Port
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the Sealed Letter to Merchant Gilbert in Merca's Port.
